contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=February 2008}} '''William Henry Hitchener''' is a British author. He had two book] published in 1813, ''St. Leonardâ€™s Forest'' Vol 1.2 (London Chapple 1813 ISBN 3-628-47673-9) and ''The Tower of Ravenwold, Vol 1.2'' (London Chapple 1813 ISBN 3-628-47674-7). Both books are [[travel books]]. {{Authority control|VIAF=72121002}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Hitchener | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Hitchener}} [[Category:Year of birth missing]] [[Category:Year of death missing]] [[Category:British travel writers]] {{UK-writer-stub}}
